medical_history.chief_complaint: Episodic right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain after eating meals.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began after eating a chicken wrap approximately 1 month ago. The patient reports intermittent RUQ pain for over a week, typically resolving within 20 minutes. The pain progressed and was associated with emesis of food-studded material. Patient also reports chills but no overt fevers.
